title: Which K-pop idols are very professional at everything they do? - Quora

response.answer_text: BLACKPINK’S ROSÉ Have you seen her professional compilation? She always has slick movements and creates it so that nobody even notices - whether it’s mic problems, outfit problems or just regular stage problems  In the rehearsals, the rest of the pinks just sing, some do 50% effort when it comes dancing, but Rosé acts like it’s the actual performance.   One time, BLACKPINK’s background audio stopped working. the rest weren’t sure, but Rosé acted like nothing happened and continued singing, leader material. QUEEN   In the videos of BLACKPINK BEING PROFESSIONAL more than 50% of the videos are just Rosé   In Interviews, Rosé always speaks and introduces the members, professionally, answering wittily. She saved Jennie once.  THE MOST PROFESSIONAL IDOL IN THE INDUSTRY
The only Kpop group I stan is BTS. I KNOW THAT OTHER GROUPS ARE PROFESSIONAL, AS WELL!! (Please don’t hate on me) Watch this if you really want to know.
